meanings.definition: The young shoots of a plant, eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I picked some fresh asparaguses from the garden for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom cooked delicious asparaguses with butter and garlic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to steal the asparaguses from the farmer's field.
meanings.sent4: The asparaguses stood tall in the garden, reaching for the sun like little green soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the asparaguses made them look like miniature trees in the vegetable patch.

meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with edible young shoots.
meanings.sent1: The asparaguses plant in our backyard produces delicious vegetables every spring.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow asparaguses for people to enjoy in salads and stir-fries.
meanings.sent3: The asparaguses plant waved in the wind, as if greeting the passing butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the asparaguses plant filled the kitchen, promising a tasty meal ahead.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the asparaguses plant bloomed into tasty shoots, ready to be harvested.
